about_the_game:
Two goddesses and a half-succubus venture into Hell to rescue Medusa who is being held captive by the goddess Athena. To get to Athena, they have to defeat three powerful Demon Lords and an army of demonic creatures.

The Final Chapter

Athena's Revenge is the third and final visual novel in the Gorgon Trilogy along with Tragedy of Medusa and Euryale's Gambit. While playing the former visual novels is not necessary, it may help with the context of the world in which the story takes place. There is a recap of the previous games at the beginning to help us all remember the important events.

The game takes place after the events of Euryale's Gambit. Stheno and Euryale join with Ashmedai and with the help of the Succubus Queen Igret Bat Mahlat, portal into Hell. There they meet a strange demon who calls himself "Aden" who agrees to help them. The small group battles countless hordes of demons as they close in on the Demonic Citadel where the Demon Lords are holding Athena imprisoned.

Original Story

The Gorgon sisters have been maligned, betrayed, used and turned into monsters. Stheno in particular has lived for millennia with a hatred in her heart without knowing why until now. She now turns her hatred upon those who have wronged her in effort to save the sister she failed to protect: Medusa. Her task isn't going to be easy and she will need to stray from her solitary tendencies, depend on others and become more than she is.

Compelling Characters

Athena's Revenge allows you to pick from among four characters' perspective. Aden, Ashmedai, Euryale, and Stheno each have a compelling and dramatic story to tell. You can choose just how to explore each story-line.

Love, Lust and Unbreakable Friendship

It's not just sex! Develop many different relationships between the characters by user-chosen interactions.

Real Emotions

​Athena's Revenge, like the others in the Gorgon Trilogy, is full of emotion. The characters each experience joy, sadness, trauma and love. Be prepared to laugh, cry and smile during this final journey.

Features:

  • Male-protagonist

  • Female-protagonist

  • Multiple-protagonist

  • High-quality animations

  • Immersive story telling

Current Content (as of version 0.7):

  • 5 Chapters

  • 60-90 minutes estimated play time (5 of 7 chapters)

  • 1200+ images and animations

Content Flavors:

  • Lesbian sex

  • Male-female sex

  • Incest Futanari (optional)

  • Lesbian-only route (optional)

About the Gorgon Trilogy
The Gorgon Trilogy follows three sisters as they fall and try to find redemption. Medusa, Euryale and Stheno are goddesses with unique powers. They lived a happy and peaceful life on their island paradise until one visit to Athens turned their world upside-down. They soon found themselves caught in a complicated political web between Gods, Demons and Succubi.
